t: About Us — Euro-American Brands
s: Euro-American Brands was founded in 1990 by our CEO Dite Van Clief, our COO Tami Targovnik, and their business partner Peter Leiendecker. From Tami’s house, this original team of three began introducing premium German confections into the United States.

t: Amazon European Marketplaces Guide | Amazowl
s: May 11, 2022 - Amazon European Marketplaces consists of eight countries located across the EU, serving more than 500 million people, compared to the 300 million Amazon serves in the US, making Europe the go-to market for US sellers looking to enter new markets.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.
